title: GeoView Core Config Schema
comments: This schema is used to validate the JSON representation of the input configuration and the internal instance of map features and geoview layers.

listOfGeoviewLayerConfig.description: List of GeoView Layers in the order which they should be added to the map.

extraOptions.description: Additional options used for OpenLayers map options

TypeListOfAbstractGeoviewLayerConfig.description: The list of geoview layer configurations. The map config validation ends here. The only thing we need to verify for the moment is it must be an array.

TypeDisplayTheme.description: Valid values for the theme property.

TypeValidNavBarProps.description: Valid values for the navBar array.

TypeNavBarProps.description: Controls available on the navigation bar.

TypeValidFooterBarTabsCoreProps.description: Valid values for the footerBar tabs core array.

core.description: Default core tabs of footer bar to use. NOTE: config from packages for time-slider and geochart are in the same loaction as core config (<<core config name>>-<<package name>>.json).

custom.description: Custom tabs of footer bar to use

collapsed.description: State of footer bar when map is loaded (expanded or collapsed)

TypeValidAppBarCoreProps.description: Valid values for the app bar tabs core array.

core.description: Default core tabs of app-bar to use. NOTE: config from packages like geochart are in the same loaction as core config (<<core config name>>-<<package name>>.json).

hideOnZoom.description: Minimum zoom level to show overview map

TypeValidMapComponentProps.description: Valid values for the map component array.

TypeMapComponents.description: Core components to initialize on viewer load. The schema for those are inside this file.

TypeValidMapCorePackageProps.description: Valid values for the map core package array.

TypeMapCorePackages.description: Core map packages to initialize on viewer load. The schema for those are on their own package. NOTE: config from packages are in the same loaction as core config (<<core config name>>-<<package name>>.json).

name.description: External Package name. The name must be identical to the window external package object to load.

configUrl.description: The url to the external package configuration setting. The core package will read the configuration and pass it inside the package.

TypeExternalPackages.description: List of external packages to initialize on viewer load.

geocoreUrl.description: Service end point to access API for layers specification (loading and plugins parameters). By default it is GeoCore but can be another endpoint with similar output.

proxyUrl.description: An optional proxy to be used for dealing with same-origin issues.  URL must either be a relative path on the same server or an absolute path on a server which sets CORS headers.

geolocator.description: Service end point to access geo location of searched value.

TypeValidVersions.description: The schema version that can be used to validate the configuration file. The schema should enumerate the list of versions accepted by this version of the viewer.

shaded.description: Enable or disable shaded basemap (if basemap id is set to shaded then this should be false).

TypeBasemapId.description: Id of the basemap to use.

TypeInteraction.description: If map is dynamic (pan/zoom) or static to act as a thumbnail (no nav bar).

geoviewLayerId.description: The id of the layer for referencing within the viewer (does not relate directly to any external service). The id will have the language extension (id-'lang').

geoviewLayerName.description: The display name of the layer (English/French). If it is not present the viewer will make an attempt to scrape this information.

isGeocore.description: A flag used to indicate that the layer is a GeoCore layer.

metadataAccessPath.description: The GeoView layer service access path (English/French).

serviceDateFormat.description: Date format used by the service endpoint (default 'DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM:SSZ').

externalDateFormat.description: Date format used by the getFeatureInfo to output date variable (default 'DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM:SSZ').

initialSettings.description: Initial settings to apply to the GeoView layer at creation time.

listOfLayerEntryConfig.description: The layer entries to use from the GeoView layer.

isGeocore.description: The isGeocore property is not defined by the user but by the viewer according to the geoview layer type. It is used as a flag indicating the type of schema used (input/internal).

geoviewLayerName.description: The display name of the layer.
The display name of the layer (English/French). If it is not present the viewer will make an attempt to scrape this information.

TypeListOfLayerEntryConfig.description: The list of layer configurations. The AbstractGeoviewLayerConfig validation ends here. The only thing we need to verify for the moment is it must be an array of at least one element.

initialView.description: Settings for the initial viewing area of the map.

enableRotation.description: Enable rotation. If false, a rotation constraint that always sets the rotation to zero is used.

rotation.description: The initial rotation for the view in degree (positive rotation clockwise, 0 means North). Will be converted to radiant by the viewer.

maxExtent.description: The extent that constrains the view. Called with [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] extent coordinates.

minZoom.description: The minimum zoom level used to determine the resolution constraint. If not set, will use default from basemap.

maxZoom.description: The maximum zoom level used to determine the resolution constraint. If not set, will use default from basemap.

TypeHighlightColors.description: Color to use for feature highlights.

en.description: The English version of the string.

fr.description: The French version of the string.

controls.description: The status of various controls for the layer (available/unavailable).

bounds.description: The geographic bounding box that contains all the layer's features.

extent.description: The extent that constrains the view. Called with [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] extent coordinates.

minZoom.description: The minimum view zoom level (exclusive) above which this layer will be visible.

maxZoom.description: The maximum view zoom level (inclusive) above which this layer will be visible.

className.description: A CSS class name to set to the layer element.

states.description: The status of initial states for the layer.

extent.description: The extent for the initial view. Called with [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] extent coordinates.

layerIds.description: ID(s) of layer(s) to use as initial map focus.

TypeZoomAndCenter.description: Initial zoom and center coordinates to set map view.

prefixItems.description: Initial map zoom level. Zoom level are define by the basemap zoom levels. Levels between whole numbers are supported to fine tune initial view.
Initial longitude value for map center.
Initial latitude value for map center.

TypeValidMapProjectionCodes.description: Spatial Reference EPSG code supported (https://epsg.io/). We support Web Mercator and Lambert Conical Conform Canada.

EsriDynamicLayerConfig.description: Structure used by the viewer to describe the configuration of an ESRI dynamic layer.

EsriFeatureLayerConfig.description: Structure used by the viewer to describe the configuration of an ESRI feature layer.

EntryConfigBaseClass.description: Base class from which we derive all the nodes (group and leaves) in the layer tree.

layerId.description: The id of the layer to display on the map.

layerName.description: The display name of the layer (English/French). If it is not present the viewer will make an attempt to scrape this information.

minScale.description: Minimum scale the layer can display (default: 0).

maxScale.description: Maximum scale the layer can display (default: 0).

initialSettings.description: Initial settings to apply to the layer entry at creation time. Initial settings are inherited from the parent in the configuration tree.

entryType.description: The entryType property is not defined by the user but by the viewer according to the geoview layer type. It is used as a flag indicating the type of schema used (input/internal).

layerName.description: Used by the input schema. The display name of the layer (English/French). If it is not present the viewer will make an attempt to scrape this information.

AbstractBaseLayerEntryConfig.description: Base class from which we derive all the leaf nodes in the layer tree.

geometryType.description: The geometry type of the leaf node.

EsriDynamicLayerEntryConfig.description: Class from which we derive all the ESRI Dynamic leaf nodes in the layer tree.

EsriFeatureLayerEntryConfig.description: Class from which we derive all the ESRI Feature leaf nodes in the layer tree.

TypeStyleGeometry.description: Valid keys for the geometryType property.

TypeBaseSourceInitialConfig.description: Base type from which we derive the source properties for all the leaf nodes in the layer tree.

crossOrigin.description: The crossOrigin attribute if needed to load the data.

TypeSourceTileInitialConfig.description: Initial settings for tile image sources.

TypeSourceImageWmsInitialConfig.description: Initial settings for tile image sources.

serverType.description: The type of the remote WMS server. The default value is mapserver.

TypeOfServer.description: The type of the remote WMS server. The default value is mapserver.

TypeSourceImageStaticInitialConfig.description: Initial settings for static image sources.

extent.description: The extent of the static image. Called with [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] extent coordinates.

TypeBaseVectorSourceInitialConfig.description: Base type from which we derive the source properties for all the vector leaf nodes in the layer tree.

maxRecordCount.description: Maximum number of records to fetch (default: 0).

layerFilter.description: Filter to apply on features of this layer.

strategy.description: The loading strategy to use. By default an all strategy is used, a one-off strategy which loads all features at once.

TypeVectorSourceInitialConfig.description: Initial settings to apply to the GeoView vector layer source at creation time.

separator.description: The character used to separate columns of csv file.

TypeVectorTileSourceInitialConfig.description: Initial settings to apply to layer sources providing vector data divided into a tile grid.

extent.description: The extent that constrains the view. Called with [minX, minY, maxX, maxY] extent coordinates.

origin.description: The tile grid origin, i.e. where the x and y axes meet ([z, 0, 0]). Tile coordinates increase left to right and downwards. If not specified, extent must be provided.

resolutions.description: Resolutions. The array index of each resolution needs to match the zoom level. This means that even if a minZoom is configured, the resolutions array will have a length of maxZoom + 1.

tileSize.description: The tile grid origin, i.e. where the x and y axes meet ([z, 0, 0]). Tile coordinates increase left to right and downwards. If not specified, extent must be provided.

TypeVectorSourceFormats.description: The feature format used by the XHR feature loader when access path is set.

TypeSourceEsriDynamicInitialConfig.description: Type from which we derive the source properties for all the ESRI dynamic leaf nodes in the layer tree.

maxRecordCount.description: Maximum number of records to fetch (default: 0).

layerFilter.description: Filter to apply on features of this layer.

transparent.description: If true, the image will be exported with the background color of the map set as its transparent color. Only the .png and .gif formats support transparency.

TypeEsriFormatParameter.description: The format of the exported image. The default format is png.

TypeSourceEsriFeatureInitialConfig.description: Type from which we derive the source properties for all the ESRI feature leaf nodes in the layer tree.

maxRecordCount.description: Maximum number of records to fetch (default: 0).

layerFilter.description: Filter to apply on features of this layer.

nameField.description: The display field of the layer. If it is not present the viewer will make an attempt to find the first valid field.

alias.description: The field alias that replaces the name when comes time to display it.

domain.description: An array of values that constitute the domain.

TypeOutfieldsType.description: The types supported by the outfields object.

TypeRangeItems.description: Definition of the range object in the OGC time dimension.

type.description: The type of style used by the layer.

hasDefault.description: Flag used to indicate that the symbology has a default value.

TypeStyleConfigType.description: Valid keys for the type property of style configurations.

visible.description: Flag used to show/hide features associated to the label (default: true).

values.description: Simple type has a single value at index 0; uniqueValue type has many entries (up to 3 for ESRI) and classBreaks type has two entries (index 0 for min and index 1 for max).

TypeKindOfVectorSettings.description: The type of geometry settings. It must respect the base type and one of the children types.

allOf.description: Base type for the vector geometry.

TypeBaseVectorGeometryConfig.description: Base type for the vector geometry types.

TypeBaseVectorType.description: Valid values for the type property of the base vector settings.

TypeLineStringVectorConfig.description: Definition of the line symbol vector settings type.

TypeLineStyle.description: Line style to use for the feature.

TypePolygonVectorConfig.description: Definition of the polygon symbol vector settings type.

fillStyle.description: Kind of filling  for vector features. Default = solid.

TypeFillStyle.description: Valid values to specify fill styles.

TypeSimpleSymbolVectorConfig.description: Definition of the simple symbol vector settings type.

TypeSymbol.description: Valid values to specify symbol shapes.

crossOrigin.description: The crossOrigin attribute for loaded images. Note that you must provide a crossOrigin value if you want to access pixel data with the Canvas renderer.

TypePostSettings.description: Definition of the post settings type needed when the GeoView GeoJSON layers need to use a POST instead of a GET.

header.description: An optional header object with string keys and string values.

data.description: A required property that can be any type.
